Room.Name: Sharkey's Pawn Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the secret pawn shoppe of Hafnia. Sharkey smiles at you as you walk in and asks what he can do for you. You see weapons and armor of all kinds decorating the walls. Great warriors come here to collect on their spoils while the desolate sell whatever they can to eat for the day. Some say Sharkey has sold used weapons to the trolls.
